channel.title: [Python] Sending commands to the OS
channel.description:
As I posted in another topic here,
[code] import os os.system("command" + "Args") [/code]
In place of command you can insert command there, and replace args with any args. Shutdown ftw
Make sure you import os, alot of people forget to IMPORT.

item.title: [Python] Sending commands to the OS
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

As I posted in another topic here,

import os
os.system("command" + "Args")

In place of command you can insert command there, and replace args with any args. Shutdown ftw

Make sure you import os, alot of people forget to IMPORT.

Read full topic
